System.Name: Skeleton system
System.Funcion: Forms a protective model to protect the muscles

System.Name: Digestive system
System.Funcion: Braks down the chemical componets of food

System.Name: Muscular system
System.Funcion: Moves the muscles by tension and contaction.

System.Name: Nervous system
System.Funcion: Gathers infomation and controlls the overall human system.
